org.socialsignin.spring.data.dynamodb.repository

Annotation Type Query


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Documented
public @interface Query

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      QueryConstants.ConsistentReadMode consistentReads
      Override consistent read mode set in the DynamoDBMapper
      ExpressionAttribute[] expressionMappingNames
      Set filter expressions for a query
      ExpressionAttribute[] expressionMappingValues
      Set filter expressions for a query
      java.lang.String fields
      A string that identifies the attributes you want.
      java.lang.String filterExpression
      Set filter expressions for a query
      int limit
      An integer to limit the number of elements returned.

    • Element Detail

      • fields

        public abstract java.lang.String fields
        A string that identifies the attributes you want. To retrieve a single attribute, specify its name. For multiple attributes, the names must be comma-separated.
        Returns:
        comma-separated list of fields
        See Also:
        Projection Expressions
        Default:
        ""

      • limit

        public abstract int limit
        An integer to limit the number of elements returned.
        Returns:
        number of results to return
        See Also:
        Projection Expressions
        Default:
        -2147483648

      • consistentReads

        public abstract QueryConstants.ConsistentReadMode consistentReads
        Override consistent read mode set in the DynamoDBMapper
        Returns:
        ConsistentReadMode to enforce on query
        See Also:
        Read Consistency, DynamoDBMapper Configuration
        Default:
        org.socialsignin.spring.data.dynamodb.repository.QueryConstants.ConsistentReadMode.DEFAULT

      • filterExpression

        public abstract java.lang.String filterExpression
        Set filter expressions for a query
        Returns:
        filter expression for query
        See Also:
        Filter Expressions, Expression Syntax Example: {@code @Query(filterExpression = "contains(#field, :value)", expressionMappingNames = {@ExpressionAttribute(key = "#field", value = "name")}, expressionMappingValues = {@ExpressionAttribute(key=":value", value = "John Doe")})}
        Default:
        ""

      • expressionMappingNames

        public abstract ExpressionAttribute[] expressionMappingNames
        Set filter expressions for a query
        Returns:
        expression name mappings for query
        See Also:
        Filter Expressions, Expression Syntax Example: {@code @Query(filterExpression = "contains(#field, :value)", expressionMappingNames = {@ExpressionAttribute(key = "#field", value = "name")}, expressionMappingValues = {@ExpressionAttribute(key=":value", value = "John Doe")})}
        Default:
        @org.socialsignin.spring.data.dynamodb.repository.ExpressionAttribute

      • expressionMappingValues

        public abstract ExpressionAttribute[] expressionMappingValues
        Set filter expressions for a query
        Returns:
        expression value mappings for query
        See Also:
        Filter Expressions, Expression Syntax Example: {@code @Query(filterExpression = "contains(#field, :value)", expressionMappingNames = {@ExpressionAttribute(key = "#field", value = "name")}, expressionMappingValues = {@ExpressionAttribute(key=":value", value = "John Doe")})}
        Default:
        @org.socialsignin.spring.data.dynamodb.repository.ExpressionAttribute
